ygData.subject: Hail all
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail everyone I am a Erudite Wizard on the Bristlebane server, I saw this list and think it is a great idea.  Just wondering if this is going to be a list for
ygData.messageBody:
Hail everyone I am a Erudite Wizard on the Bristlebane server, I saw this list
and think it is a great idea. Just wondering if this is going to be a list for
ooc stuff for tips and such or will it be a more in character advice list? Just
wondering.

Zakrul The Traveler
Companion
7th level Wizard

Opps: I had hit reply earlier and sent this to just one person, sorry about
that, to whoever recieved it I realized my mistake to late. This is my fourth
mailing list for EQ and it still doesn\'t help the withdrawl while at work.

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
